alert.note: Alert for Koolau Windward; Olomana (Hawaii) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Surf Warning issued January 22 at 4:05AM HST until January 23 at 6:00PM HST by NWS Honolulu
info.description: ...HIGH SURF WARNING IN EFFECT THROUGH MONDAY AFTERNOON FOR THE NORTH AND WEST FACING SHORES OF NIIHAU KAUAI OAHU MOLOKAI...THE NORTH FACING SHORES OF MAUI AND THE WEST FACING SHORES OF BIG ISLAND... ...HIGH SURF ADVISORY IN EFFECT THROUGH MONDAY AFTERNOON FOR THE WEST FACING SHORES OF MAUI AND LANAI... .An extra large northwest (310-320 degree) swell will produce extremely dangerous giant size surf. Coastal water overwash may occur across many low lying roadways along northern and western facing shorelines, especially during periods of high tide. ...HIGH SURF WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM HST MONDAY... * WHAT...Dangerous large breaking waves up to 25 feet. * WHERE...Olomana and Koolau Windward. * WHEN...Until 6 PM HST Monday. * IMPACTS...High. Expect very strong breaking waves and powerful currents. Waves breaking in channel entrances may make navigating the channels dangerous.
info.instruction: Stay away from the shoreline along the affected coasts. Be prepared for road closures. Postpone entering or leaving channels affected by the high surf until the surf subsides.
